item.title: About my thesis
item.description: PhD thesis I recently achieved my PhD thesis at Mondor Biomedical Research Institute, in Créteil, France. You can read more about my project: on the theses.fr website ; on the global HAL website, and, on the thesis-related HAL website. TeX template My thesis has been written using Overleaf. I simplified the final document to build a template, so I hope one can easily build upon it. Find the template in Tools.

item.title: Welcome to my GitHub Pages !
item.description: I’ve been planning to build my GitHub Pages for a while - and I finally did it ! The current theme is: hugo-theme-relearn.
